scripts.compile:main: sass src/main.scss dist/main.css -c -I node_modules/ --no-source-map && npm run filesize -- dist/main.css
scripts.compile:custom: sass custom.scss custom.css -c -I node_modules/ --no-source-map && npm run filesize -- custom.css
scripts.minify:main: postcss dist/main.css -o dist/main.min.css && npm run filesize -- dist/main.min.css
scripts.minify:custom: postcss custom.css -o custom.min.css && npm run filesize -- custom.min.css
scripts.build:main: npm run compile:main && npm run minify:main
scripts.build:custom: npm run compile:custom && npm run minify:custom
